<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lady Nanbyo (The Widow of Suffering)](/Deities.aspx?ID=179)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Revel in destruction, make natural disasters worse, allow natural disasters take their due

**Anathema** Allow a natural disaster to completely destroy a community or leave a group with no survivors

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Plague](/Domains.aspx?ID=48), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

- **5th**
[Control Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=51)

- **6th**
[Dragon Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=88)

</column>
name: Lady Nanbyo (The Widow of Suffering)
